content.rendered:
THE ZEBRA PRINT TREND

The zebra print trend is back and it’s better than ever. Animal prints have always been in style but now after Netflix Tiger King show, animal prints are more popular than ever. Yep…I said it…Tiger King style is trending. To make this trend more fresh try zebra print leggings or adding it in your accessories. For an even more bold modern update try mixing it with other prints.

Since COVID-19 we have been staying more at home and making grocery store runs. Why not trade your black leggings for a fun zebra print leggings or pants. I found very comfortable and beautiful zebra print leggings from Zara that have a modern side slit at the bottom. They look very chic with a plain white tee or a strappy top. Click here to shop Zara leggings. 

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. The gold hair clip is by Burberry. The top bag is from Rixo. Zebra print headband is from J. Behr. The bottom bag is Versace. The zebra print shoes are from Gianvito Rossi.

When nighttime rolls around it’s the perfect time to unwind with a glass of wine and relax with D’Lashes candles. This beautiful red currant scent black candle is hand-poured with a creamy blend of soy, palm, and coconut wax ensuring a long, clean potently fragrant burn. Click the link below to shop!

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

XO XO, Dionne
